title: Trade Betrayals, Film Standouts + Major FF Questions - Fantasy Football Podcast for 6/7
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, a number of fantasy questions answered! What are some tips for picking from the turn in fantasy football drafts? Which players are surprisingly good on film? Plus, the latest NFL News, pickleball talk, and more! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for June 7th, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit is available NOW

(02:05) - Draft Strategy: The Turn
(09:05) - NFL News
(19:20) - Mailbag
(20:30) - Film Standouts
(23:10) - Three shows a week
(23:45) - Terry McLaurin or Mike Williams in Dynasty?
(24:55) - Peak value for Mike Williams?
(27:25) - Pickleball Love
(28:00) - J.K. Dobbins
(30:35) - 3 WR Leagues
(36:15) - UDK Videos
(37:00) - Draft CMC 1 overall?
(39:40) - Your Biggest Fantasy Football Arguments

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
